alert.note: Alert for Bottineau; McHenry (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 19 at 2:29AM CDT until July 19 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL WARD...WESTERN BOTTINEAU...SOUTHEASTERN RENVILLE AND NORTHWESTERN MCHENRY COUNTIES... At 229 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southwest of Newburg, or 25 miles east of Mohall, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Minot Air Force Base, Westhope, Glenburn, Lansford, Carpio, Newburg, Maxbass, Antler, Landa, Russell, Grano, Hartland, Eckman, Wolseth and Roth. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
